pr_title: SAK-44292: FORUMS: Error unique result while Automatically create multiple topics for groups

timeline.bodyText: this should be a list() as more than one group/section should be returned.
timeline.author: ern
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1527,6 +1527,7 @@ public String getAllowedGroupForRestrictedTopic(final Long topicId, final String
 				.getNamedQuery("findAllowedGroupInTopic")
 				.setLong("id", topicId)
 				.setString("permissionLevelName", permissionName)
+				.setMaxResults(1)
 				.uniqueResult();

replies.bodyText: @ern Is there any problem with the changes?
replies.author: jesusmmp

replies.bodyText:
Earle has a huge refactoring of msgcntr queued up ... with huge performance gains.
Also, I was never able to replicate the reported bug. I tried several times on my local trunk  .....
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: @ottenhoff I uploaded a video with the problem. Have you seen it?
replies.author: jesusmmp

replies.bodyText: Yes, I watched several times and followed the steps several times.
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: We have reproduced this issue in our Sakai 20 in production. We introduced a new ticket (SAK-44462) but @jesusmmp has advised that our new ticket in fact duplicated SAK-44292 Maybe our testing plan in SAK-44462 can help to reproduce the issue
replies.author: mateullas

replies.bodyText: I was able to replicate today. @ern and I are looking at it
replies.author: ottenhoff
